IRS990.Description: Scholarships, awards, and BRDG Park funding

OtherLiabilities.Description: DUE TO ST. LOUIS COMMUNITY COLLEGE

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: $40,199 OF SPECIAL EVENTS EXPENSE WAS REMOVED FROM EXPENSES AND NETTED WITH SPECIAL EVENTS REVENUE.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: GRANTS ARE MONITORED BY VERIFICATION OF SCHOLARSHIPS TO ST. LOUIS COMMUNITY COLLEGE.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART I, LINE 1 & PART III, LINE 1
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: TO RAISE FUNDS, SOLICIT, RECEIVE AND ADMINISTER PRIVATE GIFTS FOR THE JUNIOR COLLEGE IN THE DISTRICT OF ST. LOUIS, MISSOURI. PRIVATE CONTRIBUTIONS ARE USED FOR RESTRICTED AND UNRESTRICTED PURPOSES WHICH BENEFIT STUDENTS AND FACULTY, SUCH AS SCHOLARSHIPS, ENDOWMENTS, EQUIPMENT PURCHASES, PROGRAMS AND CAPITAL PROJECTS.
EACH FISCAL YEAR, THE FOUNDATION BOARD OF DIRECTORS COMPLETES A CONFLICT OF INTEREST QUESTIONNAIRE WHICH IS REVIEWED BY FOUNDATION STAFF ON A REGULAR BASIS.
FOUNDATION DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC BY REQUEST (WRITTEN, PHONE OR EMAIL) FROM THE FOUNDATION OFFICE.
BECKY KUEKER HAS A CLIENT RELATIONSHIP WITH JAN HOLLOWAY. LINDA SHAPIRO SERVES AS OUTSIDE LEGAL COUNSEL FOR TOM CORNWELL.
